不止有犹奸，而且有多达15万犹太裔及有犹太血统的人加入了纳粹军队

建议看下这本书《Hitler's Jewish Soldiers》（希特勒的犹太士兵）
全名：Hitler's Jewish Soldiers: The Untold Story of Nazi Racial Laws and Men of Jewish Descent in the German Military 

部分书籍简介：
Contrary to conventional views, Rigg reveals that a startlingly large number of German military men were classified by the Nazis as Jews or "partial-Jews" (Mischlinge), in the wake of racial laws first enacted in the mid-1930s. Rigg demonstrates that the actual number was much higher than previously thought-perhaps as many as 150,000 men, including decorated veterans and high-ranking officers, even generals and admirals.

对应中文翻译：
与传统视角不同，Rigg揭露，在20世纪30年代中期，德国刚刚颁布种族法律时，有数量庞大的德国军人被纳粹归类为犹太人或“混血犹太人”（Mischlinge）。Rigg指出，这个群体的实际人数比之前人们以为的要多的多，可能达到15万人，其中还包括受过勋的退伍老兵和高级军官，甚至还有陆军上将和海军上将。
